alternate_methods:
To apply for a VIC by post print the form and send to VOSA.

If you want to pay by credit or debit card VOSA will contact your to take payment once it gets your application.

You can also pay by cheque or postal order, payable to VOSA. Send the payment with your application. **Do not send cash**.

*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
*[VIC]: Vehicle Identity Check
introduction: Fill in the VIC1 application form to apply for a vehicle identity check (VIC) appointment. Submit the form online if you're paying by credit or debit card or use a VOSA pre-funded account.
more_information:
Once VOSA (Vehicle and Operator Services Agency) gets your application they will contact you to take payment on your credit or debit card.

You’ll then be told when your VIC (Vehicle Identity Check) appointment is.

##VIC test fees

Test type | Normal fee | Out of hours* fee
- | - | -
Vehicle Identity Check  (VIC) | £41.00 | £50.00
Appeals | £41.00 | £50.00

*Normal opening hours for VIC test centres are 8am to 5pm Monday to Thursday and 8am to 4:30pm Friday. Tests can sometimes be arranged outside these hours.

*[VIC]: Vehicle Identity Check
*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
*[VIC]: Vehicle Identity Check

title: Apply for a vehicle identity check (VIC)
